topic: Where to order Rendering with Radiance (RwR)
body:
The link that Greg provided to Amazon.com to order  Rendering with Radiance  is correct, but due to the length of the URL and word wrap in some email software, the link may not work or it may be cumbersome to finesse into a working URL.


The TinyURL shortcut is:  http://tinyurl.com/2wn78b


The book can be delivered in as soon as 3 days.  The cost is $80.00US plus shipping and handling.


Happy Rendering!
-Chas
___
